ygData.subject: Question Me This . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi! I sent a long post the other day and hoped on the list today only to realize that it had not made it to this list at all. In fact, apparently my last
ygData.messageBody:
:o)

Hi!

I sent a long post the other day and hoped on the list today only to
realize that it had not made it to this list at all. In fact,
apparently my last couple of posts didn't make it to the list.

Sometimes I can be so dumb . . . but I can't help but wonder where I
sent the crazy things.
:o)

Anyway, a little question for anyone who might think about
answering . . .

Is there a level limit you need to be to get married in EQ? What are
the advantages and or disadvantages of tying the EQ knot?

:o)
Brangvyne Nic Ne Sidhe
9th lvl ranger
